amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for DOE renewable energy research and development by $42 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer approximately $12 million of the funds appropriated in the bill for nonrewable basic energy research programs to renewable energy research programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schaefer amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 279 - 135 (Roll no. 358).
